thread.title: Catch Catfish More Conveniently With the JIFFY HOOK - Designed by Clients (KSC-1031)
thread.title_full: Catch Catfish More Conveniently With the JIFFY HOOK - Designed by InventHelp Clients (KSC-1031)

author: Chrissa Chverchko
title: Catch Catfish More Conveniently With the JIFFY HOOK - Designed by Clients (KSC-1031)
text:
Two inventors from Liberty, Mo., want to streamline the process of fishing for catfish. "We designed this after realizing how difficult it is to bait a hook for catching catfish," he said. The ergonomic and easy-to-use JIFFY HOOK enables a user to bait a hook for catfish more easily, which saves time and effort. The hook also prevents loss of bait, as well as allows for more convenient and enjoyable fishing.
 Kansas City KSC-1031,
